name: OsmoGrep
intro: Terminal-native execution based agent, run full tests in parallel with sub-agents.

name: Captions
intro: Automatic Caption Generation for YT shorts and raw videos.

name: StreamSSN
intro: Real-time ASR with Whisper, optimized for real-time streaming with Adaptive chunking, similar to carteisa's ink-whisper

name: mem0 Analytics
intro: Observability and performance telemetry for Mem0 memory systems. Aggregates metrics from LLM + vector pipelines into actionable insights.

name: BreeBoost
intro: BreeBoost is a full-stack, end-to-end real-time fraud detection system built using machine learning and statistical monitoring.

name: LiteLLM Aggregator
intro: High-performance, async-first system that computes and monitors LLM API spend across millions of requests with PostgreSQL and Prometheus.

name: TabMate
intro: Playful and practical Chrome extension for saving, organizing, and exporting your open browser tabs.
